g:HTMLPanel.div:
WHAT DO WE DO? We envision to certify that projects in our network work toward providing children the quality of life. It is important for the children to reach a minimum standard in each area in order to allow them to grow and build their future as deserve by any human being. We provide support in the areas of health, education, food, shelter, clothing, hygiene, joy, hope of future, love, responsibilities, safety, guidance, compassionate atmosphere and discipline. Projects of the OWB network engage to follow the standards of these areas:
Health
Education
Food
Shelter
Clothing
Hygiene
Joy
Hope of future
Love
Responsibilities
Safety
Guidance
Compassionate environment
Discipline
